history.proof: apply (Build_SeparationAlgebra sum_worlds). - intros m1 m2 m H. qsimpl time: 2 use: join_comm,sum_worlds,Join. sauto depth: 3. - intros mx my mz mxy mxyz H1 H2. unfold join in H1. unfold join in H2. sauto depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: apply (join_comm Join sum_worlds m1 m2 m H).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type Join_A : Join A Join_B : Join B SA_A : SeparationAlgebra A SA_B : SeparationAlgebra B m1, m2, m : sum_worlds H : join m1 m2 m The term "Join" has type "Type -> Type" while it is expected to have type "?worlds" (unable to find a well-typed instantiation for "?worlds": cannot ensure that "Type@{max(Logic.SeparationLogic.Model.SeparationAlgebra.1+1,SerTop.2766+1)}" is a subtype of "Type@{SeparationAlgebra.u0}").
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros mx my mz mxy mxyz H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: apply (Build_SeparationAlgebra sum_worlds). - intros m1 m2 m H. apply (join_comm Join sum_worlds m1 m2 m H). - intros mx my mz mxy mxyz H1 H2. unfold join in H1. unfold join in H2. destruct H1 as [myz H1]. destruct H1 as [H3 H4]. apply ex_intro with (x := myz). split. + apply (join_comm Join sum_worlds my mz). apply (join_assoc Join sum_worlds mx my mz mxy myz mxyz H3 H2). + apply (join_assoc Join sum_worlds mx myz mz mxy mxyz). * apply H1. * apply H4.
